overview: When a young woman loses her father, love, and her faith, she embarks on a journey when she becomes lost in the desert. Surrounded by silence and a vast emptiness, she meets a friend, and together they will discover an unreasonable love. Ruth will walk a hundred miles, without food or water, through the desert for a fighting chance to have to most basic of human rights â€” to love and be loved in return.
title: Book of Ruth
